boardgame.description: Potion Explosion is a game for 2 to 4 players by Horrible Games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It was designed by Lorenzo Silva, Andrea Crespi and Stefano Castelli._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dear students, it's time for the final exams of the Potions class! The rules are always the same: Take an ingredient marble from the dispenser and watch the others fall. If you connect marbles of the same color, they explode and you can take them, too! Complete your potions using the marbles you collect, and drink them to unleash their magical power. Remember, though, that to win the Student of the Year award, being quick won't be enough: you'll also need to brew the most valuable potions in Potion Explosion!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

COOL MINI OR NOT (CMNPTN001) It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s senior year at Horribilorum Sorcery Academy for Witty Witches and Wizards. All the hard work and studying comes down to this: the final exams! Under the helpful, tutelage of the Headmaster, players have learned how to handle volatile ingredients and turn them into fantastical potions! By pulling ingredients like Unicorn Tears and Fairy Dandruff, represented by marbles, out of the potion dispenser, the higher up ingredients slide down to fill in the gap. Players try to make the same ingredients smash together causing explosions and big turn combinations. Once all the necessary ingredients have been collected, players complete the potion for points and special abilities. The player with the most points graduates head of the class!

Box may have some small, typical box wear - but contents are 100% Contents will be bagged _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; boxed as appropriate Shipping will be via courier within 2 working days of payment. Contact me for non-uk shipping costs.

This game has been played twice. This game includes TWO sets (potions, marbles, instructions, bases) so you can play with up to 8 people. Due to some unfortunate life events, I am forced to sell my board game collection. For several years I was paid to demo games and afterward, had the option of purchasing the game I demo’d. Because of this, most of my games are either new or have been played once. I have a large number of games for sale, some quite small, so please check my inventory to see if you’d like to purchase multiple items. I will work with you a bit on price if you do, and of course, it will save on shipping. I am an eBay top-rates seller with over 4200 positive feedback. I ship promptly and pack the items well. You will not receive beat-up games with pieces thrown all over inside the box. After purchase, buyer will be responsible for exact shipping charges. I accept PayPal only unless prearranged ahead of time.
Reserved for auction winner: Chris Rees Includes playmat, promo and acrylic tokens.

Potion Explosion Promo Playmat This is not for the game but for a play mat that was given out at Potion Explosion game nights. This is an awesome promo. It’s a really great Playmat that holds all the components of the game. There’s a place for the potion tray, the five stacks of potions, and all the tokens. The price includes free shipping to the US via USPS first class mail. The playmat will be shipped rolled rather than folded up.
